attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: SCRAP THE DVLA SORN as it is a waste of man hours & it has so many problems with it & a saving on the cost of road tax would be far better to the motorist against all the wasted postage & paper sending out to owners & for confirming it has been SORN

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
